name: DoC8
author: Irene A. Mitchell

sections.description:
Document your project and show it to the world with the help of this simple but flexible DoC8 plugin that comes with sample code attachments.

Minimum Requirement

  • PHP 5.6 or higher
  • MySQL 5.6 or higher
  • WordPress 4.4+

Automatic Installation

Navigate to Plugins menu and click Add New, then enter DoC8 in the search field. You should see DoC8 in the results list. Click install then activate.

Manual Installation

Download DoC8 from WordPress plugin repository. You can choose to extract the downloaded file onto [YOUR-WORDPRESS-INSTALLATION]/wp-content/plugins or navigate to your Plugins Menu, click Add New then click “Upload file”.

Screenshots

Changelog

1.0.0

  • Feature – New custom content design for documentation, knowledge-base or any other document type content.
  • Feature – Multiple sample code attachments to showcase or use as user guide.
